website_summaries.verdict: Very sturdy and well-built with a lot of space to get pots out of the cabinet and organized on the wall.
pros: Comes with a lot of hooks
Lightweight for the size of the rack
Metal is   sturdy but not too thick to add extra weight
Great if your ceiling is too high for a hanging rack
cons: Supplied wall anchors are not as sturdy as they could be
You may want to supplement with your own

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rack. Great for creating some extra storage space. Makes cooking easier, have this rack installed near the stove. Grabbing a pot or pan or utensil is convenient when at arm's length while cooking. 1. Sturdy metal and painted. 2. Easy to assemble. 3. Nice amount of hooks, 15. 4. Stout hooks. Holds my heavy cast iron and multiclad stainless steel pots and pans no problem.
customer_reviews.author: T. Estrick

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: and customizable. :) I wasn't feeling the love of the black finish so I painted it with spray paintI adore how it turned out and matches the other accent pieces in my rental. :)
customer_reviews.author: QueenOPearls

customer_reviews.title: Installing it was really easy but make sure to double check that everything is ...
customer_reviews.text: Installing it was really easy but make sure to double check that everything is level. It lost a star because the supplied wall anchors are really cheap. They are flimsy and I honestly don't think they would make the unit anymore secured to the wall. Do yourself a favor and get better ones that will actually help keep the pot rack on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: High quality product, well made, but instructions are a bit lacking (photo posted) Luckily I’m smart enough to figure out how to hang this, it’s not rocket science, it’s shelving I’d like to see more quality products from this seller, hopefully they’ll work on instructions or get someone to put some better instructions together for them.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Zaugg

customer_reviews.title: impossible to mount
customer_reviews.text: The classic mounting strategy of holding an item to the wall while someone else marks the screw-holes works nicely for most products, but not with this one: that is because until it is fully mounted and being held together by tension, it is wildly unstable. Holding it against the wall in a way where the holes are actually in the right spots relative to each other is impossible, because every individual part can flex into a weird position. It's simply two many parts, too loosely screwed together. We returned this and are ordering something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome space saver! I love it and it was easy to put up
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall, but poorly designed. Still worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This rack looks good and definitely saves a ton of space in the kitchen, but the design is sort of stupid. The fact that it doesn’t have any back support when it’s put together makes no sense. It makes mounting it quite difficult, and I’m a handy guy. Definitely a 2-3 person job to get it accurate. If there was some back support, it would be 10x easier to install. All that said, once you get it installed correctly, it looks quite good and it’s sturdy. Holds all my All-Clad pans with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Truly life changing organizer for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rack, it arrived on time and packaged fine, it changed my whole kitchen and made things much easier on me and for me, I would recommend to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: mark snider

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with my new cast iron pots.
customer_reviews.text: Was able to do it all by myself.. easy to assemble and hang.. get lots of compliments.. comes with everything you need.. a little tip I used a large piece of wrapping paper after I assembled the rack I placed the rack on the wrapping paper and marked off where the hole should be. Hung the wrapping paper on the wall with tape and then drilled the holes where was marked. Turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: I HATE getting my pots and pan out of the cupboard, so when I moved into a new house I knew I wanted a pot rack. My kitchen isn't huge, so I decided to get a double shelf rack, figuring I could always use the space. This one is perfect. It is sturdy and holds all of my pots & pans and has room on top for my colanders & strainers. :-) I may even add a potted vine. A recent visitor to my house fell in love with this pot rack as soon as she walked in the door. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Shadowmedic

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy workhorse
customer_reviews.text: This holds a lot of weight, holds it well, and looks great. I've got 35 pounds of All-Clad cookware on there with no problems. The last rack I had hung from the ceiling by two points, so every time I added or removed a pot/pan the whole rack would tilt and other pots and pans would slide around. This one is stable. I highly recommend you use studs if possible, or wall anchors if studs are not where you need them to be so you don't have it pulling out of the wall after a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: The product was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Although the product first shipped with a defect piece, I was shipped a replacement piece with relative ease. The product was easy to assemble, and required few tools (screwdriver, wrench, drill, and hammer). It seems to hold up the weight as well. I have 10-15 pots hanging in addition to the lids and bowls on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Handsome, Sturdy, Good quality. Need skill and tools to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: This was the only two-shelf rack I could find. My son assembled and hung it. We found the pictograph instructions a little confusing, no written instructions were provided, but with some logic and skills we were able to get it hung safely and securely. It is quite handsome and has freed up cupboard space. I like having the pots and pans easily at hand.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need some magical reinforcements!
customer_reviews.text: You most likely will need someone to help, just to hold while you measure on the wall and screw the whole thing into place. All the reviews saying it doesn’t hold without building some magical backing system, I have 20+ pots and pans on mine easily holding 30 pounds or more with everything on it just drilled into the drywall...NO PROBLEMS AT All!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you know stud distances.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my son's kitchen. It wasn't as straight forward as expected to install. Because the installation holes didn't line up with the studs, he had to use special toggle bolts which with time and use can sag and compromise the rack. He ended up placing lighter pots on the racks which is not what he wanted. Overall, he's pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: thryallis

customer_reviews.title: 2 major Cons
customer_reviews.text: One of the shelves has a terrible weld making the shelf far from straight and is especially noticeable since it’s the side pinned up against the wall; it sticks out like a sore thumb. The hardware that comes with it is just trash, do yourself a favor and go to a hardware store and get some proper drywall anchors. Other than those two cons the rest of the shelf looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Great organization but accessories for install need major upgrades
customer_reviews.text: I have roomates so I keep my dishes, pors pans etc seperate. This was a great addition to keeping stuff organized in my room and able to free up space. The problem I had was all 6 of the screw mounts broke when trying to install, also for $75 why they didn't come with metal versions that support more weight. I had to go to the store and buy my own screws already in a wall mount so it could support the weight of glassware, dishes and lots of pors and pans. Feels cheaply made for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice space saver. Holds cast iron.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of difficult to install for 2 people- Don’t try it alone. But we got it up and it looks good. I will take down to paint my walls and will probably spray paint the entire thing matte black (it is currently glossy black) it holds my 2 cast iron skillets with ease, although I don’t think I’ll attempt to put my Dutch oven on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah AM

customer_reviews.title: great shelf unit but mounting it was difficult as our ...
customer_reviews.text: great shelf unit but mounting it was difficult as our home is an older home so the spacing for the screws to hit wood was off. If my husband didn't know how to correct for that the shelving would have not held up to the weight of my pans and pots.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Fay

customer_reviews.title: Worst pot rack available
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst buy of the year. It’s flimsy and not straight. Tried three times to get it level and its garbage. I am throwing it away as unfortunately the boxes were already recycled.
customer_reviews.author: jonelle

customer_reviews.title: 16” centers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year and just opened the box today and the support arms were bent like a pretzil ,I spent most of the day bending this thing back in shape what a pain in my ass and finally got it up on the wall And the flat pieces are 16” centers so they lined up on my studs and its pretty secure after all the bs I would have sent it back but i was determined to get this damn thing on the wall next time your people should check your stuff before you ship it
customer_reviews.author: joseph t.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and fairly easy to mount. I didn’t have wall studs where I need to mount this so I used 1 1/8” x 3 3/4” lumber for mounting. Just wanted to make sure it was secure. I had some leftover paint so I painted the boards to match the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit flimsier than I would have liked, which makes it a two-person job for installation, but I love how it looks in my kitchen and I would recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Curren

customer_reviews.title: Some good, some bad
customer_reviews.text: It seems well constructed and plenty sturdy for its intended use. The paint was chipped in a couple spots and I'm worried the finish will not hold up. The assembly instructions are worthless, except for a good laugh.
customer_reviews.author: NorthernOak

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: This pot rack was just what my mom needed in her small kitchen. She has very little space so when I saw this I knew she’d appreciate it. Top and bottom shelf fit 3 medium pots comfortably and the hanging handles add extra room for anything that can dangle. Set up was easy with 2 people but if you’re doing it alone it will be a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy G

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This rack is perfect! Holds all my pots and pans, comes with plenty of hooks, and is just as sturdy as other buyers say it is. Only thing I didn’t like is that it was more difficult to install than expected, but that was mostly because I mounted it on 1x3 boards so that I could screw the rack into the studs for extra security (I used another costumer’s example).
customer_reviews.author: scubaspaz

customer_reviews.title: What a great pot rack for the money
customer_reviews.text: What a great pot rack for the money. I looked at many similar racks with shelves and the cost was a lot greater than what I paid for this shelf. It is beautiful and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Pot Rack!! We have enjoyed it since the first day of installation.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Brian

customer_reviews.title: The small details
customer_reviews.text: One of the screws wont go in so i have to remove the weld and nut and replace it with my own nut which isnt easy without precision tools that wont damage the rest of the parts(welds)
customer_reviews.author: Danny Franco

customer_reviews.title: My son is happy with this
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son as he has a very small kitchen with very little storage. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: georgia-sunflower

customer_reviews.title: Not great at all
customer_reviews.text: This rack is not steady or easy to hang. Very flimsy for the price
customer_reviews.author: K-METZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rack
customer_reviews.text: I assembled it by myself. It looks nice. I did upgrade the anchors because the ones that came with it seemed "wimpy".
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great way to add space to small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, lots of shelf space and a TON of hanging space below and on the sides. I pack mine with a food processor, cutting boards, blender, juicer, 5 mixing bowls. Also I hang 4 pans with 2 lids, 2 pots with their lids, colanders, kitchen towels, numerous kitchen utensils. Also magnetic for all your magnet used.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! It's simple yet attractive, it gives my small kitchen so much more space. The directions are really tough to understand as they were poorly translated but we managed fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I sold my home which had a huge kitchen. This rack helped me organize all of my pots and pans and lids in my significantly smaller kitchen. The lip on the top shelf prevents my glass lids from falling off. We did have to bolt it through its sturdy metal brackets to the studs. The holes in the bracket did not match where the studs of this old home was. On very strong now.
customer_reviews.author: Thoula

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install, poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Both the rack and the included mounting hardware were low quality, which is surprising for the high price point. One of the drywall mounts was bent and not able to be mounted, and one of the screws had a completely stripped head. When assembled, the rack's 6 mounting holes did not sit flush with the wall, which made it impossible to mount without forcing the rack to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Installation isnt easy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but installing this wasn’t easy I couldn’t get it level so today husband has to work on it. I am usually pretty self sufficient but this one got me.
customer_reviews.author: Judith M. Wardwell

customer_reviews.title: Works As Should
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t take long to put together. Holds good amount of weight- lots of my cookware is cast iron. No indication that it might give in or not hold
customer_reviews.author: sarah broaddus

customer_reviews.title: More space
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I have made in a long time. Kitchen is on smallish side with limited cabinet space. Now I can hang my cookware in one spot. Shelves give extra space for items. Hooks make moving cookware around easy.
customer_reviews.author: amby

customer_reviews.title: What a space saver!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to install, keeps everything at hand while still keeping it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Chief

customer_reviews.title: Serious upgrade to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Finally freed up cabinet space and can now easily see pots and pans. Big improvement.
customer_reviews.author: dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Minimalistic and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Solid and inexpensive. New apartment kitchen has minimal cabinet space. This fits all my pots and pans. Hanging hooks are clutch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our kitchen and displays my husband's cookware nicely. Large enough to hold larger pots on the shelves and provides great storage in a decorative and durable manner. I'd definitely recommend this rack for anyone looking for a functional and decorative solution for displaying/storing their cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle MG

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf, good luck with installation with the worst instructions ever.
customer_reviews.text: Well built, nice looking shelf. Very strong. You're on your own with the installation. The instructions seem to have been translated by or written by a 4 year old. They make no sense at all.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the best pot rack for my kitchen!!! Love it! Holds a lot !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These shelves have worked out perfect so far for what we needed them for. You can fit a lot of stuff on them! The only issue was they were a little difficult to put up. One of the screws had stripped pretty easily. However I'm still very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dienes

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and hang. I would upgrade the mounting hardware though, especially f you are a cast iron person. Overall it is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice & expensive looking
customer_reviews.text: Too big for my place, but gave it to a friend and now his kitchen looks flyyyyyyyy
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: As noted many times, the anchors supplied are garbage. I'm amazed people recognize that and still leave five stars. The rest is adequate, for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, a little tough to install
customer_reviews.text: This is a two person assembly and install. One to level front to back and left to right while the second person screws it to the wall. I would have liked another horizontal support where the upper screw holes are. It is very sturdy especially if you screw into wood or hit studs.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small kitchens where space is a premium
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to save space in a small kitchen. I was able to mount this on the wall in 10min or so with no issues. I have gotten so many complements on it since putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brayman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Is it the heaviest metal on earth? No. Does it hold our cast iron dutch oven without a problem? Yes! Unlike some of the other reviews that I read before purchasing it, ours did not come with any scratches or misalignments. We are very happy with the rack and the extra storage space it gave our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Use different hardware
customer_reviews.text: I really love the look, but plan on using different hardware to instal. The screws that come with this rod it are cheap and and do not work. In addition, there was a manufacturing error on the bracket that made it a little more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this rack
customer_reviews.text: I Would give 10 stars if i could. I love this rack.
customer_reviews.author: B. Rew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It fit perfectly in my kitchen space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT seem strong enough for my pots / pans, let alone my cast iron stuff. Can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Katie G

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, difficult installation
customer_reviews.text: The design of this product is poor, and the installation is exceedingly difficult. A master craftsman and I both worked to install it and it took us two hours. I recommend looking at an alternative product where the installation is far easier.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Golub

customer_reviews.title: No regerts with this buy.
customer_reviews.text: That you see in the picture is what it does. And my wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: TheWaters

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver for small living spaces
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a lifesaver in our small apartment. Easy to mount up if you have a drill. Can easily hang up to a dozen pots and store A LOT on the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Ashvir

customer_reviews.title: Great piece!
customer_reviews.text: Great with lots of space for pots and kitchen things!
customer_reviews.author: Dyan Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing screws and anchors to assemble and was so low quality the black paint peeled off as it was taken out of the box and when handled. It literally peeled right off. Instant return.
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: OK but very tough to get level and install
customer_reviews.text: overall - ok construction and components - but installations instructions will not yield a proper install. Much more goes into a safe, solid and level install.
customer_reviews.author: charles bell

customer_reviews.title: Na
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything amd used for all pans and I hang the lids
customer_reviews.author: Andrew bartholomew Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Ease of assembly
customer_reviews.text: It came fast and was easy to put together. The shelves are great for kids but the hanging area is a little cramped for lots of pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shelves, love the industrial look the add to my kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Just D

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult to assemble because it's so flimsy. Its very small but the hangers are really sturdy and hold all my cast iron skillets perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Martin

customer_reviews.title: No longer have to get on knees to get pots and pans!
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a whim while looking for things to improve our kitchen. It was better than I thought and holds much more than I originally thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to return the unit because it did not fit the space I purchased it for. But it was exactly as described and pictured. It looked well built.
customer_reviews.author: Powell

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: Showed up in a box that wasn’t damaged, but the shelves were warped. Didn’t notice it until you go to mount it on the wall and the shelves don’t sit flat. Had to do some jimmy rigging, but it will do for $70
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Josties

customer_reviews.title: Use 2 people to mark and install
customer_reviews.text: As advertised just a little hard to hang up straight.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and while reading instructions I noticed there aren’t enough of black screws in the baggy
customer_reviews.author: Leury rumaldodiaz

customer_reviews.title: Not too sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality for the price. Wife didn’t like it had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: edwin morales

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments on this piece in our kitchen. The instructions were easy to follow and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: it looks great and it hold a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Richards

customer_reviews.title: Easy and nice
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy and very easy to put together was a amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Extra storage space is great!
customer_reviews.text: Large size works great for holding extra pots and pans I would have no other place for!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Tappendorf

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. I did it myself but 2 people might be easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great pot rack 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good looking finish. Fairly easy to install & plenty of storage, more hooks than I needed. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not worth $80
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty junky and the wall anchors are terrible. If you do buy I definitely recommend also getting nicer anchors and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen and needed to free up cabinet space. This is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: patty davis

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Holds up really good strong recommended to replace screws with heavy-duty screws screw into studs in the wall
customer_reviews.author: Levon

customer_reviews.title: Two people to assemble, one to hold one to fasten to the wall.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to put together by one person, not impossible though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam E

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap pot holder
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and functions well only complaint is ts a little bendy but that could have been how I constructed it but it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: edwin

customer_reviews.title: Get your own wall anchors
customer_reviews.text: The wall anchors provided are sub-standard. Two of them cracked as I was putting them into the wall. Other than that, it is sturdy enough and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1 out of 4 packages not bad, nothing wrong with this package or item.
customer_reviews.author: Fionacarnes

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect space saver.
customer_reviews.text: We moved into a smaller home and needed to utilize our space. This worked perfect. Easy to put up and ready to use within 30 minutes. Nothing bad to say here.
customer_reviews.author: Will Kehr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and came in good condition we love it.
customer_reviews.author: José Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed, Over priced!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Quality. Missing weld on support bracket. 2. Price. VDOMUS list this rack as $59.00 on their site. Why $20 more on Amazon? Greed? I sent rack back. Over priced low quality "made in China" crap. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Laurence G. Kay

customer_reviews.title: Semi difficult mounting...
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not leave reviews. Was built well. Strong. I had a tough time hanging the thing on my adobe walls....but once I got the wall securement figured out...no problem. One thing I did have to do is use larger screws on the top brackets as the screw head was not big enough to hold it. I think an non handy person might have difficulties...but that is not me.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this POS
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. Nothing is straight and the brackets do not match each other. Where the brackets attach, are not welded "in line" with each other so the brackets do not line up or mount flush with the wall. Therefore the selves are not square or straight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: it is not easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: While the concept of the assembly is very straight forward and simple, it is not easy to put together. You need 2 people for assembly. The product seems to be fine Though.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Miller

customer_reviews.title: Useless instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but the instructions are unusable: incomplete and poorly translated.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Leah

customer_reviews.title: This is so sturdy and well built & worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is so sturdy and well built & worth every penny. My hubby mounted ours to 3 strips of wood, stained the wood then mounted it. I love love love this it's such a space saver.. and it's huge!! Fits so many pots and pans ..see photo
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: This is TRASH. Poorly made. So bad that my husband spent an hour trying to make it level only to finally realize that the welding points for the rods weren't even close to the same distance from the bottom or top of the metal band. So the only other point to level from is the solid metal band, but sadly that was poorly welded together making it impossible to level properly. Now I have holes in my wall to repair and a big waste of time. This product is extremely simple, and should be easy, which directly reflects how sloppily put together it was from their warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Seems to be well constructed. I wish it came with a paper marked for drilling the holes in the wall. Had to make mine, and it wasn’t as simple as I thought it would be. Otherwise, it works well. I ordered the black to go with my appliances. Wish it was a bit more decorative or that it came in a chrome finish. Looks a bit utilitarian. Holds all of my pans, so I am pleased with that. Overall a good product. Not great, but good.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Rack, Tons of Space
customer_reviews.text: I love this pot rack and plan to buy a second one to install side-by-side my first one. It has a TON more space on it than I expected. I can easily fit every pot and half my pans. Having two shelves really makes this better than most of the pot racks I've owned in the past. It felt a little pricier than I'd hoped, but considering the fact that it's solid as a rock and will last a lifetime, I can't really complain. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Just a Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very large capacity yet fits in small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very small apartment with little wall space in the kitchen. Yet I was able to get this rack mounted on the only wall, and it fits like it was made for the space. I cannot get into the low cabinets in my kitchen so this pot and pan rack is a Godsend. It's attractive and well-made. My friend who helped me put it up (it is a 2-person job) says that he thinks he will buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Meg from Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: “Thick wrought- iron” it is NOT!
customer_reviews.text: “Thick wrought- iron” it is not. Nothing wrought or thick about it. It’s very light steel with a cheap powder coat that scratches if you look at it wrong. It’s going back. Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Mark a.

customer_reviews.title: Class up your kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we needed to clear up some space in our cabinets. Directions were straight forward however it takes some effort to ensure level and struts are vertical. One of the wall screws sheared off in a stud. Pre drill like they recomend and you will be fine. I would prefer if the wall screws were black but not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thrift

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Being an apartment dweller a ceiling mounted rack was a no go. This was the perfect solution for my available space and I only have to patch a few small holes when I decide to move. And consequently since my pots and pans are at my fingertips now, I’m so much more inclined to cook at home than eat out. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha James

product_meta.title: VDOMUS Shelf Pot Rack Wall Mounted Pan Hanging Racks 2 Tire (Black)
feature_bullets: ORGANIZE: Clear up some precious cabinet space while keeping all your cooking utensils within arms reach, no more digging through pots and pans looking for what you want, all is neatly organized in front of your eyes.

DISPLAY: This pot rack will also be a stunning addition to your kitchen. It displays all your favorite cookwares and creates a ambiance of profession in your kitchen. Its simple yet attractive design will surely make kitchen a warm and cozy place.

LARGE STORAGE CAPACITY: 2 large grid shelf measuring 29.5" by 13.7" with 10 moveable hanging hooks, there is enough storage place for even the most enthusiastic culinary lovers, you could fit a lot of stuff on it!
SOLID CONSTRUCTION: Thick wrought- iron will not get out of shape when holding heavy weight cookwares, advantage paint-coat ensures a 100% rustproof as well as resist daily scrapes.
EASY INSTALLATION: Comes with all needed accessories and instruction, you could start installation once you've received the package.
